title: SEO Fundamentals
description: This self-learning plan covers the essential concepts and techniques of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) to help you improve the visibility and ranking of your website on search engine results pages.

weeks.title: Introduction to SEO
learningObjectives: Understand the importance of SEO for online visibility and success
Learn the key components of SEO, including on-page, off-page, and technical optimization
topicsToCover: What is SEO and why it matters
Search engine algorithms and ranking factors
weeklyTasks: Conduct a basic SEO audit of your website
Identify and prioritize key SEO opportunities

resources.name: Beginner's Guide to SEO by Moz

weeks.title: On-Page SEO Optimization
learningObjectives: Optimize website content and structure for better search engine visibility
Implement effective title tags, meta descriptions, and header tags
Understand the importance of image optimization and alt text
weeklyTasks: Optimize the on-page elements of your website
Conduct a content audit and identify areas for improvement
resources: On-Page SEO: Anatomy of a Perfectly Optimized Page by Backlinko
The Beginner's Guide to SEO: On-Page Optimization by Moz

weeks.title: Off-Page SEO and Link Building
learningObjectives: Understand the importance of backlinks and link building for SEO
Learn strategies for acquiring high-quality, relevant backlinks
Explore the role of social media and content marketing in off-page SEO
topicsToCover: Link building strategies and best practices
Social media signals and their impact on SEO
Content marketing and its role in off-page SEO
weeklyTasks: Develop a link building strategy and start outreach
Optimize your social media profiles and content for SEO
resources: The Definitive Guide to Link Building by Backlinko
Off-Page SEO: The Beginner's Guide by Moz

weeks.title: Technical SEO and Website Optimization
learningObjectives: Understand the importance of technical SEO for search engine crawling and indexing
Learn how to optimize website speed, mobile-friendliness, and other technical factors
Explore tools and strategies for ongoing website monitoring and optimization
topicsToCover: Site speed optimization and image compression
Mobile-friendly design and responsive web development
weeklyTasks: Conduct a technical SEO audit of your website
resources: Technical SEO: The Definitive Guide by Backlinko
Google's Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Starter Guide
